request.description:
This method creates tracking point targeting rule.

You need to parse GUID on your request URL.

EXAMPLE: /TrackingPointTargetingRules/0000
(0000 - guid)

"ageConstraint" format: 1.13:30:50.100
(days.hours.minutes.seconds.miliseconds)

This method allows to retrieve tracking point targeting rule.

You need to parse previously generated GUID on your request URL.

EXAMPLE: /TrackingPointTargetingRules/0000
(0000 - guid)

This method updates tracking point targeting rule.

You need to parse previously generated GUID on your request URL.

EXAMPLE: /TrackingPointTargetingRules/0000/Settings
(0000 - guid)

"ageConstraint" format: 1.13:30:50.100
(days.hours.minutes.seconds.miliseconds)

This method deletes tracking point targeting rule.

You need to parse previously generated GUID on your request URL.

EXAMPLE: /TrackingPointTargetingRules/0000
(0000 - guid)
